i am new in this, what is Activation

Its works great! But the only problem im having is, there's no audio at all, not when I want to play a file, not under the vid clips, no mp3s..I tried saving a movie, after saving I played it back as "my movie"there was no audio under it either.. :( does anyone know what can cause that?

Is This, 
Pinnacle Studio HD Ultimate *Collection* 15 
as the pic shows or 
Pinnacle Studio HD 15 Ultimate as the title says? 

As there is two different one on the website.

I do not find an "activation blocker", where is it ?

(there is a Pixie Activation though, but it seems to be a Pinnacle activation of plug in or so.)
Couldn't install. Installer couldn't find the .msi. Neither could I. LOL

There is no "Activation Blocker"; only a "Activation" application which is a Pinnacle application.

The other two files/applications are "Instructions" and "Install_Setup" as stated in Instructions.
Very clear thanks very much, keep up the good work!
